'''Occupied Hold''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the third and final part of [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Acer Palmatum Chapter]]: Act I - [[A Strange and Friendless Road]], ''[[Ere the End, a Glance Back]]''.
